title: Drawing, Plate Design:  Les Mures [Mulberries], for the Service des Objets de Dessert [Service on the Theme of Desserts], 1819–20
title_raw: Plate Design:  Les Mures [Mulberries], for the Service des Objets de Dessert [Service on the Theme of Desserts]
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash on cream laid paper, circular border in pen and brown ink
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown ink, upper center:  Les mures etc.; upper right:  Des enfants cueillent des mures, un pe [unreadable due to paper loss]/barbouillé effraye une petite fille qui le Sau[?]/auprès d'une femme, qui reproche a une autre p...[unreadable due to paper loss]/fille de s' êtres taché; sur le devant [words crossed out]/le[sic] fille de fais manger un autre enfant avec précaution/dans les crainte des tachée [The children pick mulberries, a dirty.... freightens a little girl who ...to a woman who scolds another child for having stained herself; in the foreground [word crossed out] a girl carefully feeds another child for fear of making stains]
provenance:
Collection H.N.
Spencer Samuels, New York
dimensions:
10.5 cm (4 3/16 in. ), image
11.6 x 22.5 cm (4 9/16 x 8 7/8 in.), sheet at widest points
description: Outdoor scene under a mulberry tree.  A woman holding a baset of mulberries, center middleground, admonishes a young girl who has gotten stains on her dress.  A seated woman, center foreground, carefully feeds mulberries to a kneeling child.  A child has climbed the tree to pick mulberries, two other children play beneath the tree.  In the right margin of sheet, a graphite sketch of a child holding her dirty apron. On verso, a graphite sketch of a standing woman, her basket of mulberries on a stone wall, scolding a child with a dirty apron.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Plate Design:  Les Mures [Mulberries], for the Service des Objets de Dessert [Service on the Theme of Desserts], 1819–20. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash on cream laid paper, circular border in pen and brown ink. 
1989-13-13
